monitoring_location_description.title: Monitoring Location Description
monitoring_location_description.description: Text description of the monitoring location.

tribal_land_indicator.title: Tribal Land Indicator
tribal_land_indicator.description: Indicator denoting whether or not a location is on tribal land

tribal_land_name.title: Tribal Land Name
tribal_land_name.description: Name of American Indian or Alaskan Native area where the location exists

alternate_monitoring_location_id.title: Alternate Monitoring Location ID
alternate_monitoring_location_id.description: Alternate identifier used by other organization

alternate_monitoring_location_context.title: Alternate Monitoring Location Context
alternate_monitoring_location_context.description: Organization ID for alternate monitoring ID, required if Alternate Monitoring Location ID is reported.

monitoring_location_source_map_scale.title: Monitoring Location Source Map Scale
monitoring_location_source_map_scale.description: Integer representing distance on ground for one unit of measure on map or photo.  Required when Horizontal Collection Method Name is

monitoring_location_horizontal_accuracy_.title: Monitoring Location Horizontal Accuracy Measure Value
monitoring_location_horizontal_accuracy_.description: The horizontal measure of the relative accuracy of the latitude and longitude coordinates

monitoring_location_horizontal_accuracy_.title: Monitoring Location Horizontal Accuracy Measure Unit Code
monitoring_location_horizontal_accuracy_.description: Unit of measure of the relative accuracy, required if Monitoring Location Horizontal Accuracy Measure Value is reported.

monitoring_location_horizontal_collectio.title: Monitoring Location Horizontal Collection Method
monitoring_location_horizontal_collectio.description: Method used to determine Lat/Long coordinates

monitoring_location_horizontal_coordinat.title: Monitoring Location Horizontal Coordinate Reference System

vertical_measure.title: Vertical Measure
vertical_measure.description: The measure of elevation (i.e., the altitude), above or below a reference datum.

vertical_unit.title: Vertical Unit
vertical_unit.description: Unit of measure of the vertical measure, required if Vertical Measure is reported

vertical_collection_method.title: Vertical Collection Method
vertical_collection_method.description: The name that identifies the method used to collect the vertical measure of a reference point.  Required if Vertical Measure is reported.

vertical_coordinate_reference_system.title: Vertical Coordinate Reference System
vertical_coordinate_reference_system.description: The name of the reference datum used to determine the vertical measure (i.e., the altitude).  Required if Vertical Measure is reported.

monitoring_location_country_code.title: Monitoring Location Country Code
monitoring_location_country_code.description: Code for Country,  recommended if state code is used not in (default) US.

monitoring_location_state.title: Monitoring Location State
monitoring_location_state.description: Postal abbreviation for Monitoring Locations's primary state, required if county code is reported

monitoring_location_county.title: Monitoring Location County
monitoring_location_county.description: FIPS code for Monitoring Location's primary county

aquifer_name.title: Aquifer Name
aquifer_name.description: Name of the aquifer in which the well is completed.

well_formation_type.title: Well Formation Type
well_formation_type.description: Name of the primary formation or soils unit, in which the well is completed.

well_hole_depth_measure_value.title: Well Hole Depth Measure Value
well_hole_depth_measure_value.description: Depth below land surface datum (LSD) to the bottom of the hole on completion of drilling.

well_hole_depth_measure_unit.title: Well Hole Depth Measure Unit
well_hole_depth_measure_unit.description: Unit of measure of the vertical measure, required if Well Hole Depth Measure Value is reported.

monitoring_location_attachment_file_name.title: Monitoring Location Attachment File Name
monitoring_location_attachment_file_name.description: The text describing the descriptive name used to represent the file, including file extension.

monitoring_location_attachment_type.title: Monitoring Location Attachment Type
monitoring_location_attachment_type.description: File text extension, free text not domain list validation.  Required if Monitoring Location Attachment File Name is reported.
